title: I Wouldn't Mind Being Loved
description:
Kimura Rin is a young office worker who's constantly harassed, bullied and otherwise spends her time at work suffering. With no future ahead of her, and nothing she wants to do, she wonders why the world hurts her this way...

Until, after an incredible night with an incredible woman, she decides to become a lesbian escort.

matches.title: The Private Report on My Lesbian Experience with Loneliness
